content.value:
CREATE TABLE EMPLOYEE
        (EMPLOYEEID INT AUTO_INCREMENT,
        FIRSTNAME VARCHAR(30),
        LASTNAME VARCHAR(30), 
        PHONE VARCHAR(30),
        HIREDATE DATE,
        SALARY INT,
        PRIMARY KEY (EMPLOYEEID)
        )

expression.source:
`CREATE TABLE EMPLOYEE
        (EMPLOYEEID INT AUTO_INCREMENT,
        FIRSTNAME VARCHAR(30),
        LASTNAME VARCHAR(30), 
        PHONE VARCHAR(30),
        HIREDATE DATE,
        SALARY INT,
        PRIMARY KEY (EMPLOYEEID)
        )`

arguments.source:
`CREATE TABLE EMPLOYEE
        (EMPLOYEEID INT AUTO_INCREMENT,
        FIRSTNAME VARCHAR(30),
        LASTNAME VARCHAR(30), 
        PHONE VARCHAR(30),
        HIREDATE DATE,
        SALARY INT,

initializer.source:
DB1->execute(`CREATE TABLE EMPLOYEE
        (EMPLOYEEID INT AUTO_INCREMENT,
        FIRSTNAME VARCHAR(30),
        LASTNAME VARCHAR(30), 
        PHONE VARCHAR(30),
        HIREDATE DATE,
        SALARY INT,
        PRIMARY KEY (EMPLOYEEID)
        )`)

statements.source:
var ret = DB1->execute(`CREATE TABLE EMPLOYEE
        (EMPLOYEEID INT AUTO_INCREMENT,
        FIRSTNAME VARCHAR(30),
        LASTNAME VARCHAR(30), 
        PHONE VARCHAR(30),
        HIREDATE DATE,
        SALARY INT,
        PRIMARY KEY (EMPLOYEEID)
        )`);
